**Product Stock Information**

Access current stock levels and availability for products across warehouses. Retrieve essential inventory data for stock management and order fulfillment.

> [!IMPORTANT]
> This endpoint provides real-time stock information including available quantities and pending orders.

MethodDocumentation.GET: You can retrieve **stock information** for products, including current quantities in stock, free stock available for orders, and quantities already committed to orders across different warehouses.
